name: LightsOut (LinusAndersen)
description:
Save Christmas in this hard (some folks would even call it unfair) puzzle game.

Figure out what the rules are for the christmas balls to light up or just try to guess the right configuration out of the 256 possible ones.

Merry Christmas

Fröhliche Weihnachten

Project licensed under Creative Commons.
